type: Legendary Creature – Human Pegasus Knight Peasant
rules_text:
Flying
[i]Hit and Run[/i] – {4}, {T}: Faye, Devoted Heart, fights up to one target creature without flying. If Faye wins the fight, untap her.
[i]Villager Origins[/i] – Whenever a creature dealt damage by Faye dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Faye.
